website_summaries.verdict: It might not have the most eye-catching design, but you definitely won't want to miss this growler if hard-wearing durability and fuss-free use rank high on your list of must-have features.
pros: High quality vacuum insulated food grade stainless steel keeps beverages cold for up to 16 hours and hot for up to 12 hours
Flip top lid is easy to handle and flavor maintains its authenticity
Sturdy handle offers effortless pouring and carrying
cons: Although it doesn't seem to affect performance, the plastic latch connector quickly shows signs of stress
Large handle requires extra storage space

customer_reviews.title: Defective latch design results in a stress line on the latch.
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the latch that holds the lid is defective and arrived damaged with a visible plastic stress line. I didn't even use this yet. Another reviewer also noted this. The handle is much thicker than the part that holds the latch. The latch should have been made thicker, as thick as the handle. I foresee the latch will soon break off, in particular when hot water is put into the Growler.. Unfortunately, this is a design defective. Please fix this,Thermos. Once the latch goes, the whole growler becomes useless.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviews.

customer_reviews.title: Built to last!
customer_reviews.text: ATTN CRAFT BEER LOVERS, this growler has the Surgeon General Warning and capacity stamped on the bottom! This is key for most states regulations for growler refills. This is a very stout thermos, bottom almost feels like a solid piece. Stopper/cap has a stainless steel bottom, which means your beer will not be touching any plastic. Clasping mechanism is very tight and part of the handle which is attached at the bottom with a Phillips screw. So after many years of use, if the clasp gets too loose or breaks, I'm sure a quick inquiry to Stanley will get you in the right direction for a new part.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Big boy holds a LOT of coffee--perfect for a 12-hour shift. Quality build!
customer_reviews.text: Slightly on the big size, but the well-designed, sturdy handle makes it easy to tote around. Seems like exception build-quality. I'm using it for hot liquids mostly and I would take their 18 hours "HOT" estimate with a big grain of salt. My guess is that if you filled it and didn't ever open it during those 18 hours, it would stay very close to the hot it was when filled. But if you open it and take some out, that time is likely only 6-7 hours. Really helps if you pre-fill it with boiling water and let it sit for 5 minutes and then dump and fill with coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Elwood P Dowd

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, Absolutely Terrible!!! Very upset
customer_reviews.text: I thought they would of sent me the bottle with the updated latch, it has been a big complaint with other users and they even showed pictures of the new bottle with the new latch. I feel like they are just trying to push their old/obsolete inventory out to unsuspecting buyers. Be careful if you decide to order one.
customer_reviews.author: vkt

customer_reviews.title: a great growler, but not without issues
customer_reviews.text: Kept drinks cool the whole day. Will hold carbonation.easy to use handle. Dents easier than expected. Cap drips when opened. Slightly taller than standard growler height, may result in difficulty getting refills. Plastic latch area shows signs of possible plastic fatigue.
customer_reviews.author: Rick W

customer_reviews.title: best at this price point probably.
customer_reviews.text: It's probably the best growler at this price. The seal kind of sucks though. I had the growler in my trunk and of course there's going to be some shaking. I did not expect that to cause a leak though, and there unfortunately was. I've only filled it twice so far, first time no leaks. Second time there was leakage. After only two fills, I've noticed the 'whitening' on the plastic stress points that has been described in depth in other reviews. I will probably keep using this and hopefully this will hold up for at least a year. I plan do a fill about once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Haruki Sato

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Use these to hold home brew when bringing to other locations. Hours after pouring into the growler it comes out just as cold and fresh as when it went in. Have had many comments on these. Keep in refrigerator, fill, and hours later it is still ice cold. Filled it once with a crushed ice drink, left in car for 6 hours with the temps will above 100 degrees inside the car and every drink poured from this was as if I had just made the drink, in fact I would need to lightly shake the growler to get the drink to pour out it was kept that cold. Excellent product and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: B. Burk

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime warranty is a joke
customer_reviews.text: The plastic on these bottles break after normal use. Stanley’s warranty requires you to send it back to them at your own cost. They also say this: If no defect is found and the product is performing as designed, it will be recycled in our facility. We are not able to return used products sent in to us. In order to take advantage of our warranty guarantee, the cost of inbound shipping is borne by the consumer. We are not able to provide shipping labels at this time.
customer_reviews.author: seandigity

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: The reviews about the stress lines are real! I bought 2x Blue Hammertone with minimal stress lines, but obvious when looking for them. I bought 1x Green Hammertone for my dad (throwback), with HEAVY STRESSLINES, and I bought 1x Black Matte with no visible lines but paid a lot more for it. The only option is to return and I have as gifts. BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: S G

customer_reviews.title: Love it. We use for water vs beer
customer_reviews.text: Love it. We use for water vs beer. I decided to try this after running out of water while out with the kids and had to spend almost $20 to buy 4 small water bottles at an outdoor event! We use it to refill my leakproof water bottle I always have in my bag. Came in real handy at my son's basketball game too. Washed after we got it, filled with water and kept in fridge. Now we make sure to grab it on the way out and refill when we return. Keeps water ice cold and no taste. Buying 3 more for emergency and longer outings.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 5

customer_reviews.title: Great Growler for Craft Brews
customer_reviews.text: Started using two of these to get my local craft beer during the COVID lockdown. Local breweries can only sell to go now. These are great for getting the beer home and able to keep it fresh for days, (weeks in the fridge??? I can't let it sit that long). Couple things I noticed that are a plus: The growler is easy to put thru the sanitizer. Very nice during the COVID. After weeks of use, plastic is holding up perfect. The marking on the bottom of the growler has enough "legalise" to satisfy my local guys. They are great way to collect brewery stickers, too!
customer_reviews.author: Homer

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite jug
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a beloved ORCA Silo which broke and is no longer made. The handle is comfortable, drinks stay cold for a long time. I love the stainless construction which does NOT alter the taste of drinks in the Growler. The lid locks positively and is leak free even with carbonation. The Stanley feels sturdy and well made and its nice to know the warranty is there should I ever need it. This is my new favorite Growler
customer_reviews.author: Doug Danzeisen

customer_reviews.title: Love this growler
customer_reviews.text: Love this growler. Easy to open and close, also easy to pour. I have another growler that is a twist top, and sometimes when filled it doesn't get sealed properly. It's also difficult to pour when full. No problems with this growler at all. People tell me all the time how great it is. Also, keeps beer cold all night long until it's empty. No need to put in the refrigerator. Nice and convenient when it's right next to you! Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews about the potential for breakage of the clamping mechanism. I haven't seen any signs of stress on mine so far, so I hope that doesn't become an issue. Until it does, this thing is an awesome growler. Seals really tight and is great at keeping my beer cold. I had it filled at the brewpub and the next day opened it to pour a glass and heard a very satisfying "pop" as the lid opened - it obviously had not leaked any carbonation over the prior day and the beer taste was indistinguishable from the glass I had at the brewpub.
customer_reviews.author: cincyJR

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my drinks cold even in the heat all day. I used this while on vacation in Arizona, and my water was ice cold with ice still in it after a whole day baking in the sun at 110F+. The outside was so hot I could barely touch it from the sun, and I was shocked to see that my drink still had ice in despite that! Stanley has been around forever, and they deserve their excellent reputation. Plus their products are much more reasonably priced than others on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Ben R

customer_reviews.title: I love getting growler fills, even though microbrewery cans are probably cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Having this growler makes getting beer more of an event. I take it to local microbreweries on weekends and fill it up, and nobody has turned me away for not having an acceptable growler yet. The latches display signs of plastic fatigue, as other reviewers have noted, but I'm not worried about that yet. It keeps the beer cold for about 12 hours, although it goes flat quickly after the first time you open it. Haven't taken it on a road trip yet, so I guess that's the next frontier.
customer_reviews.author: @rocknrao

customer_reviews.title: 1 minute of use, broken????????
customer_reviews.text: After using ONCE, FOR 1 MINUTE, I noticed a stress fracture on the PLASTIC clip that holds the top onto the growler? If this is not normal, please someone explain?
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: no so happy looking back...
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for years now. Wanted a larger bottle but the pin that holds the top on keeps slipping out so the design is really problematic. Also doesn’t keep water really hot for more than an hour or two even from a boil. Stick to ones with the screw tops, they rock. they’re smaller but last and they keep things hot much longer.
customer_reviews.author: TVW

customer_reviews.title: This Is All You’ll Ever Need...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent growler. I like mine so much that I bought two. This thing is cool and completely unpretentious at the same time. I’m not sure that I agree with other reviewers who claim the the latch has a designe flaw. The entire thing just seems extremely well-designed and durable. I guess time will tell but based on my experience so far, I’m optimistic. I will say that prices on these are all over the place, and fluctuate like crazy. I’ve seen Amazon change the price on this exact same item by as much as $20 within 24 hours, so keep that in mind and keep your eyes open.
customer_reviews.author: imtnbikewv

customer_reviews.title: Convenient size for vehicle travel or all-day
customer_reviews.text: I bought this even though I already have plenty of Thermos-like containers. Turns out I love it! This one is great because I can use ice and still have enough space left to have plenty to drink. The handle makes it really easy to pour into a cup or mug. The lid is rock solid for leaks. I haven't had the chance to use it for beer, but have used it for soda, ice water, coffee, hot tea, and lemonade. Keeps drinks cold and hot. I still use my smaller thermoses when I just want a few cups, but this is the one I bring if I'm going to be traveling or need an all-day container.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Over all I am happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Keeps cold stuff cold and hot stuff hot. Over all I am happy with it. Like several others have mentioned, the plastic around the latching mechanism is discolored as if it has already been stressed from the tension of latching the top. I use it almost daily, and so far there is not indication of the plastic or latch breaking anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmi & Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Better than a thermos!
customer_reviews.text: I need to drink 2 to 3L of water every day. That's a lot of water to carry around in plastic bottles that get hot in my car and besides the water starts to taste odd. This container holds about 2L and if you add a little ice, the water stays nice and cool the entire day. It's easy to pour water from into a smaller container for drinking. The growler is lined with metal, not glass, so there is nothing to break. A great, healthy way to stay hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Growler and first class customer service by stanley!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this growler two years ago to store hot water. The water can be kept hot over 12 hours without a problem. After two years, the seal on the cap is broken. Since it has lifetime warranty, I emailed stanley. After filling out a form on their site. They 2 day shipped a replacement to me without charge. They definitely have my business going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: Definite value for the money. I pre chilled in refrigerator and with water and ice. My first fill was IPA , Lakefront , Hazy Rabbit. I had some every night and stored in refrigerator. After the fifth day it still tasted fresh and had a pop to it.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, leak proof and well insulated.
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for half a year now, every week use and using it camping. It keeps beer cool for multiple days while out camping even in hot temps as long as you follow common sense rules: cool it down before adding the cold beer (cold water fill it for a few minutes before adding beer), and most importantly do not keep opening and closing it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy P.

customer_reviews.title: Now my favorite growler.
customer_reviews.text: These growler are pretty nice and hold the temperature of the contents. I can fill it full of hot water for cleaning in the evening and the water's still hot in the morning. The best part is the handle, though, which makes pouring the contents so much easier. That's my biggest problem with insulated growlers - the difficulty of pouring the contents - but this growler doesn't have that issue. And they go on sale for ~$17 from time-to-time and that's when to get one.
customer_reviews.author: Hisashi T. Fujinaka

customer_reviews.title: Great for beer, also great for those 54 Oz juices
customer_reviews.text: This Growler is amazing. Keeps my water ice cold for hours. I also use it to fill up a half gallon of juice for a long road trip. I put a couple ice cubes in the growler and have a nice cold beverage my entire car trip. I also take this unit to the hot springs, and put up to five beers in the growler; my beer stays ice cold trying for my entire soak in 105 degree water. My non insulated growler tends to heat up after about an hour or two in the hot springs.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling with Craft Beer!
customer_reviews.text: Got a sweet deal on this vacuumed sealed growler right around Christmas 2016. These are awesome growlers definitely keeps beer cold for a while. I am impressed with the seal on the cap, zero CO2 escaped. I was curious as I have 2 Stanley SS growlers (non-insulated) and they seals are so-so. Again, I got a sweet deal and bought 2 of them, the day after I placed my order, the price almost doubled. From a beer guy, this growler is ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This item was advertised as a new product and I received a used product which is nasty with this corana virus going around so I had to bleach it. The other problem with this item was that it didn't come with the rubber for the leak on the lid and it starts to leak, thank God that I have an old one that have this rubber. I'm very disappointed I feel that this a scam.
customer_reviews.author: mario

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing. I use it for beer mostly
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I use it for beer mostly, but I'm sure it is useful for other things as well. It keeps beer cold for 24 hours without having to refrigerate and the really nice thing is that the beer stays carbonated for longer than a normal growler too. With a normal growler I feel like I need to refrigerate and drink the beer the same day, this basically removes the need for refrigeration and buys me an extra day. Great for road trips.
customer_reviews.author: DCarlisle

customer_reviews.title: Best hydration tool I have.
customer_reviews.text: This has significantly increased my water consumption. I fill it with ice, then water and carry it in my truck always, or tractor when working. Lasts forever, won't spill, no dirt or bugs can get in it. Thought I'd use it for beer, but so far it has been all water. Have bought 3 as gifts because I love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Tough, well-insulated, and great looking growler
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I go into a growler bar I get compliments from the workers and other patrons about my Stanley. It's classic, rugged, and does its job better than almost everything else out there on the market. Vacuum insulated with a wide pour opening. It keeps beer cold and looks good while doing it. They have sales on these every now and then so jump on this whenever they have it on for less than $30. You definitely won't regret it if you're looking for a good growler.
customer_reviews.author: Randy S.

customer_reviews.title: amazing......
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time buying this thermos. the original one was dropped off a 2nd story roof, I forgot it on the roof and was left in the sun. when i went to retrieve it some 5 hours later, the case was so hot i couldnt hold on to it. It tumbled to the edge fell off the roof and hit the asphalt down below. To my amazment, it was still holding water and the water was cold, not ice cold but cool enough to be refreshing. After a huge disappointing purchase of stanleys legendary thermos(3 replacement tops and still leaking) Stanleys back on top, At least with this Growler.
customer_reviews.author: A Serafin

customer_reviews.title: Well thought out growler
customer_reviews.text: We have owned stainless steel growlers for a long time. The problem we always had was the lid always seem to really freeze on. I don't know if it is just screwed on too type (despite our please not to), or the fermentation does it. Also, it is hard to pour. We just received these growlers, but they seem to be engineered where this is not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Cattleman's

customer_reviews.title: OK for Hot but not beyond 6 hours.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knowing it's primarily for beer however I use this to keep my tea hot for long periods of time. The shallow lid design keeps it extremely hot for about 5 or 6 hours but not nearly as long as the deep/overlapping lid design of other vacuum insulated containers I have - which keep it near boiling for 9 hours or so. The blue model has a Stanley sticker as opposed to an engraving which doesn't add to the legendary Stanley drink experience.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Eckel

customer_reviews.title: Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: Like many others say the fixed part of the latch is designed with a flaw. The fixed part of the latch that is attached to the handle clip is much thinner than the handle plastic. A white stress line is formed right away on the latch which will eventually cause massive failure. Be weary of this time as it will let you down at some point due to the fatal design flaw
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Verma

customer_reviews.title: Leaky
customer_reviews.text: I have 2, I am not confident in them as they leak from time to time. The problem is you can actually rock the top side to side. A great way to get beer all over your backseat.
customer_reviews.author: 4point2

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my girlfriend. She was struggling from some low- quality nonsence she bought at a brewy. This one seals well and looks much sturdier. The last one kept losing it's gasket for the lid. The stanley has never had such issues and I'm glad to have it over the other one.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Blackford

customer_reviews.title: Great Growler
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome, wide mouth so it is easy to fill and pour with no glugs to spill or foam up the beer. Holds temp well when traveling, keep the beer cold all day without refrigeration. Holds pressure very well to maintain carbonation and preserve the beer. Will probably invest in another.
customer_reviews.author: Corey A Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Love these growlers!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a black Stanley growler for about 3 years now, and I absolutely love it. I was able to get 3 more for some folks in the family that have been eyeing it, and they couldn't be happier with them. Quality is top-notch, and keeps whatever beverage cold on the hottest days. The stainless steel cups that came with the green ones I ordered are pretty nice too, if a little on the small side.
customer_reviews.author: Dante

customer_reviews.title: Dented and Scratched
customer_reviews.text: Its all dented and scratched, as if dropped before packaging. I'm not happy, considering how expensive it is. 1st time I've received damaged product fram Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Really keeps water cold!  Still ice at the end of the day!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this Stanley Growler. I purchased this in the green for my husband. He is a construction worker and out in the summer heat. He has been using this for some time now for his water and just loves it! At the end of the day...there is still ice in this. He's never been more impressed or happier with a gift than this one. I hope the lid holds up because it is held down with a latch. It looks plastic at the hinge...but so far is holding up fine and has a lifetime warranty so I should not worry about that. This is a quality item!
customer_reviews.author: KSU

customer_reviews.title: Great, well built product
customer_reviews.text: Great, well built product. Dinged a star for not being viable for soda - keeps it cold but the process of pouring out a 2 liter in to this basically leaves the soda flat. Also, using soylent in this gunked up my rubber stopper. Stanley has a lifetime warranty though so given my unique use of the product I don't really ding it for that, as I can get it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Mirrorsaw

customer_reviews.title: I love this growler
customer_reviews.text: A friend had one and I thought I would try to use it for water on hot days. It keeps my water good and cold for 10 plus hours in the heat as long as you don't have it in direct sunlight. I haven't used it for anything hot only cold and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bigal

customer_reviews.title: This growler is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This insulated growler is simply OUTSTANDING. I'm frequently on the road for work and a lot of times I end up driving near great breweries or just stopping in a little brewery in a town I've never been to. This growler is perfect because I can get it filled and the beer is fresh from the tap and perfectly cold the next day. If I don't finish the growler within a day and a half or so, I just put it in the fridge. It seals so well that it preserves the beer for several days beyond what a traditional glass growler will do. Do yourself a favour and get one of these!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Way way better than glass growlers. A solid investment.
customer_reviews.text: To quote the great Chicago poet Serengeti, "Stanley. Makes. Great. Tools." This growler is the standard 2 quarts, so breweries and brewpubs will know how to price a fill-up. And this beauty keeps beer cold and carbonated properly much longer than your standard glass growlers, which really are terrible for keeping draught beer drinkable. I also have used this for large-batch cocktails during picnics and beach trips and it's great for that, too. I suppose you could also fill it with non-alcoholic beverages like iced tea. It's a free country.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Camping must
customer_reviews.text: This kept my beer pretty fresh for a long time...went on a long 10 day trip with my favorite craft..ended up hitting breweries on trip so only drank about half...forgot about it in cooler...opened after trip nearly exploded on opening...seal was that tight...beer was still drinkable co2 wise..incredible...did good job on keeping cold when I had it out but was kept in cooler a good share of the time...great for camping
customer_reviews.author: frugal

customer_reviews.title: Keep your DIPA’s cold
customer_reviews.text: This is the best growler there is in my opinion. Looks great, keeps beer ice cold, and has the alcohol warning not he bottom if your state is particular about that for growler fills. My local breweries comment on it basically every time I fill up. Worth the investment and leaps and bounds better than glass growlers. The handle also makes for easy carrrying and pouring. If you want a quality growler just buy it and trust the Stanley brand.
customer_reviews.author: M.F.A.

customer_reviews.title: Well done Stanley!
customer_reviews.text: First off, I dont drink beer. I purchased this for a vessel to keep my Lemonade/iced tea nice-n-chilly in my work van. That being said...WOW!!! It was 90 degrees today and I still had ice 17 hours later. I looked at the yeti but they want $100 for it...I paid $35 for a vessel that's built like a tank, has a handle, and the lid stays attached which is super handy...I win...side note I use the Stanley vacuum pint as well and it is amazing...ice all day long...well done Stanley!
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! It's very light, and keeps beer cold for a long time if that's what you want to use it for..it seems much more practical then the old style clay top growlers. I would definitely recommend. I used it on fathers day (80+ degrees) and had it out in the sun for over an hour...poured another beer, and it was still ice cold!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It is soooooo perfect & keeps beer super cold for a few hours
customer_reviews.text: We have used this several times since we got it for Easter. It is soooooo perfect & keeps beer super cold for a few hours. We have gotten so many questions about it & admirers that we are sure not to leave it anywhere as it will disappear. :)
customer_reviews.author: Lupita Morales

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this growler to make fridge made ice tea. Fill it halfway with ice water, add 1/2 cup of sugar, close lid and shake vigorously to dissolve the sugar, fill the rest of the way with ice water, add a lemon slice or two and eight teabags, put it in the fridge and let it steep overnight. In the morning you have delicious ice tea.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Shores

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. I own several glass
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I own several glass, stainless steel, and even thermos growlers. This is the best: The handle looks tacky but is very useful to carry and pour, the beer stays cold even on a warm day in Alabama, the mouth is wide enough for a good scrubbing, the lid is attached, can't get lost and is not flopping around during a pour. Solid and hard to beat at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Bama Boy

customer_reviews.title: Great growler!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item based on quality, price, looks, and that it has a handle. I love the beautiful matte black color because it is the perfect background to place brewery, sports, and other stickers.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Watt

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Solid. Holding up so far for daily use. No floppy handle to make noise or pinch your fingers. Love it! Just carry a cup with you since this doesn’t have one. Easy to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: AntTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Hot Stuff Hot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take to class in the winter to offer students hot coffee. It was a big hit, as it kept the coffee hot. Easy to use, and it's durable, considering it's been dropped. Holds a lot of cups of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: PdD Girl

customer_reviews.title: The quality and performance you expect from a product bearing the name: Stanley
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keeping your beverages hot or cold and draft beer carbonated! At half the cost of the 64ozthis really should be a no brainer. About the only issue I've had is that the opening size is not large enough to accommodate the larger than standard ice cubes I typically make usingfor my 30oz vacuum walled insulated Tumbler.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bunsen Honeydew

customer_reviews.title: Kept beer cold for over 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: I got it filled at a brew pub on Saturday during lunch. I didn't get to open it until dinner time on Sunday. The beer inside was cold and carbonated. I've had it over a year now and I haven't seen any of the issues some people report with the latch. My experience has been 100% positive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This works great at keeping beer cold. It also works way better than the glass growlers that growler stores try and get you to buy with their beer. I would say it keeps beer good for max 4 days before it starts to go flat. That’s enough time to consume all of its contents!
customer_reviews.author: bmw

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this and he's picky.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this so much he made me buy it a brother. We call them "Stanley" and "Stanley Jr." So maybe I didn't buy it a brother and bought it a son? The seal is super strong and keeps beer fresh for a long time. So he can go to our local growler fill place, fill up and still have fresh beer a week later. Although I personally don't understand why you'd wait a week to drink really good beer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needed for the Avid coffee drinkers
customer_reviews.text: This mug does not leak any fluids and at the same time we'll keep a hot beverage steaming for hours on end. I can fit a whole pot of coffee in there and drop this thing anywhere and show how durable it is. I would definitely recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: its must need!
customer_reviews.text: I myself travel for work and always on the road I have filled this sucker up with coffee or tea or ice water to the top! what I didnt finish either more than half the ice was till there the next day or it was burning my throat still very handy! saved me money from buying gas station coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Pimienta

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the insulation qualities of the two wall construction, but what makes this growler unique are the handle and its closure. The handle means one hand can hold the growler while the other hold the glass, even if you are small, it still works. The closure latch means no spills and even if the carbonation builds up, you can get to the goodness inside with big sweat.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Morris

customer_reviews.title: This Growler is great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: This Growler is great for traveling. It keeps the drink cold a very long time. I love it!!! The opening is big enough to put regular ice in your drink if you want to keep it even colder. I actually bought this to take to work. I didn't have easy access to water that I liked. It was perfect. It also cuts down on invading the environment with plastic bottles.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the Stanley name!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my husband and my son each one of these growlers. They are nice and sturdy - good quality workmanship. Keeps my husband's coffee hot all day!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Shopper

customer_reviews.title: GREAT THERMOS
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS, MY DAD USED TO HAVE ONE VERY MUCH LIKE IT. SO IT WAS AN EMOTIONAL, IMPULSE PURCHASE. LARGE CAPACITY, KEEPS COLD OR HOT. FILL IT FOR THE DAY AND IT GOES IN MY CAR WITH ME. A REAL LIFE SAVER. STANLEY IS EXCELLENT QUALITY.
customer_reviews.author: c.g.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Works as a growler should. I like the wide opening for easy pouring and cleaning. Let's face it, the best part of this is the design and call back to the older Stanley thermos. Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: PjS

customer_reviews.title: Really, really, really keeps liquids cold for a long time
customer_reviews.text: I filled it with about half water and about half ice cubes and put it on my nightstand with a mug for a drink if I woke up thirsty. Three days later, it still had some ice left! Love the size. You won't use it in your car drink holder or throw it in your briefcase, but as a stand-alone insulated pitcher it is A+.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Chang

customer_reviews.title: Nice but damaged
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice growler but it was put in an empty box with no bubble wrap. It had a dent on the bottom. See photo
customer_reviews.author: Danny C

customer_reviews.title: it is hard to explain how great this is
customer_reviews.text: Wow! it is hard to explain how great this is. I use it EVERY DAY. The top is absolutely liquid tight, no leaks at all. No messy screw on cap. I clean mine and then put it in the fridge over night, then when I fill it with cold coffee and a few ice cubes it stays cold all day and there are still a few ice cubes left at the end of the day. It is an actual steel container insulated with a vacuum. it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Moynihan

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: The stress line thingy is there when I got it(pls see other reviews for details). So far so good for 1month usage, 5 stars thinking it will not break.
customer_reviews.author: smokywilly

customer_reviews.title: Stanley's Growler - Cold & Hot Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: 2 quarts capacity is the perfect amount. The handle is solid and ergonomic. Durable. Built for years of hard core service. Double lined for both Cold and Hot liquids. Stanley's design is flawless! Timeless! Classic old school features are perfect for today's demands. Totally impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing PuddyTat

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Well built and sturdy, keeps beer cold and holds a good seal. Hard to get a half growler worth since you can’t see the level
customer_reviews.author: PE

customer_reviews.title: Best travel/camping growler on the market
customer_reviews.text: It is in fact 64 oz and it hasnt leaked or broke on me yet (4 months). By far the best durable growler for travel and camping use. I us it about 3 times a month without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Leigh

customer_reviews.title: way better than a glass growler obviously
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice growler, wide opening makes it easy to clean (you still need a bottle brush, but still way easier than a glass growler). When I pre-chill this with ice and water I can reliably get 2 1/2 - 3 hours of the beer still being "cold". This review is after 2 months use.
customer_reviews.author: Bert	Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service from Stanley!!
customer_reviews.text: After a month, a part broke. This was past the Amazon date, so no fault there, but no response whatsoever from Stanley on my warranty claim. Poor customer service from a company I had expected to stand by their product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Really practical and fun but weak plastic.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice growler. Will keep beer cold for long time. May leak if carried on the side, so always carry it vertical. One thing is that the latch plastic seems weak! It became white where the latch hooks.
customer_reviews.author: ASTG

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Just received mine. Stress crack underneath the latch, plastic collar separating from growler body, and dent on bottom. Not worth my time to return so I guess I'll keep it until the hinge breaks which will probably be soon. Other than that, the quality of the handle, rubber seal, and the inside seems good. Too bad they didn't implement the quality throughout the whole product.
customer_reviews.author: Christian B.

customer_reviews.title: Great thermos!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic thermos, but it’s a Stanley so quality is expected. Keeps ice cubes all day in 100+ degree days! A real lifesaver in the dog days of summer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ercolino

customer_reviews.title: Cold stays cold
customer_reviews.text: Keeps ice frozen for 3 days easy. Filled with ice cubes and water and replenished the water nightly and 3 days later I still had ice left over.
customer_reviews.author: Bassman481

customer_reviews.title: Best Growler, bar none!
customer_reviews.text: A-Mazing! This keeps my craft beers cold for a really long time and the seal keeps the beer carbonated longer than any standard growler. I actually have to be careful when I open this as the seal is so good that the lid has occasionally popped right open on me when I unlock the lid. So awesome that I bought one for my brother in Georgia!
customer_reviews.author: cerealkiller11

customer_reviews.title: Plastic hinge fixed? Stronger.
customer_reviews.text: Plastic stresses appear to be fixed on my order placed May 2017. The hinge is redesigned, and the engineer in me sees it as intuitively stronger. Time will tell but, the issue in many other reviews appears to have been addressed.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Kephart

customer_reviews.title: Goodern gum
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned the latch might interfere with my drinking out of it - not a problem. If I lost it I would want another. Ice cubes fit into it well, mostly use it for ice water / drinking glass.
customer_reviews.author: JamesElmer77

customer_reviews.title: My new travel companion to the brew  pubs
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my beer to go nice and cold. I always start off with chilling the growler in the freezer before I hit the road just to give it that extra coldness. Once filled with frosty beer, it will stay cold for many hours.
customer_reviews.author: M. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Not just for beer
customer_reviews.text: Don't laugh at me, but I use this to keep ice water handy throughout my day and found I drink more water because of it. Does a great job at keeping liquids cold.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Fillmore

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works really really well, however wish I could get unending free refills at our local brewery.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great idea to travel with draft beer
customer_reviews.text: Installed a kegerator and needed something to bring draft out on the boat and decided to try this. Works perfectly..holds the carbonation very very well.
customer_reviews.author: Bob G

customer_reviews.title: This is the second time buying one of these. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time buying one of these. The first one purchased was green, my husband uses it everyday. I bought this one as a back up, but may have to wait quite a while before it's needed. They are extremely durable, and really do the job. He drives a Tractor Trailer and this growler get's banged around and dropped but still keeps his coffee HOT. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Jean Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Stanley does it again
customer_reviews.text: Over-sized handle is great. Wide-mouth for easy pouring and fast clean-up. Lid hinge is stiff enough to keep lid out of the way while pouring. Super-tight seal. Concerned about the plastic clasp for lid breaking and will update review after a few months of use. Using for hard cider so no idea how long beer would keep carbonation.
customer_reviews.author: FunnyFarmORTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great thermos
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep my coffee in it. These say they keep hot for 18 hours which is true. I make my coffee and 24 hours later it is still fairly warm. But I also like cold coffee so I would still drink it. I had the regular sized Stanley thermos but really needed a bigger one. All the other ones don't stay hot for that long.
customer_reviews.author: XrenwaldoX

customer_reviews.title: I really like this Growler so far
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Growler so far. I've used Stanley thermos' for years and this one has not disappointed. I've seen comments about it not keeping beer cold, long enough, but I have not experienced that as a problem. I would think that if it lasted any longer it would go flat anyway. (Just a thought.)
customer_reviews.author: Fredrick L. C

customer_reviews.title: Stress line? Its fine.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from Dicks Sporting Goods last year. It too has the "stress line" everyone here talks about. However, its still working fine, I use it every single day- opening it and closing it many times each day. I bought it last year and I have it sitting next to me right now. I use it to store boiling water for tea. Edit: Just bought one off Amazon, works great just like the other one
customer_reviews.author: Christopher T

customer_reviews.title: Great growler for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great growler for the price. Pressurized top and aluminum container the only way to go. May cost a bit more than the standard glass growler but so much better in keeping the beer cold, fresh and not going flat. If you are going to spend a few bucks extra for craft beer do the same for the container you carry it in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pre-chill it properly and it will keep the beer nice and cold.
customer_reviews.text: At 11 am on a Friday I had this pre-chilled at a restaurant and filled with Craft Beer. I took it on a lengthy hike and drank half of the beer that evening after dinner. The following morning I decided to sample the remaining beer to find out that it was still roughly 45 degrees! I am very impressed at how well this worked.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Best Thermos Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best thermos ever!! When I forget it in my car overnight it is still ice cold and the cubes are still whole!
customer_reviews.author: MTE

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great growler! Keeps the beer cold, travels well and is durable
customer_reviews.author: Rob P.

customer_reviews.title: Great growler
customer_reviews.text: So far this is great. Gave as a gift and was used over the 4th. Beer was filled with no issues from distillery. Stayed carbonated until the second day after opening and it was not opened for four days. Son is very pleased with gift
customer_reviews.author: J R

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty work
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My husband used it for cold drinks at work. Stays cold in a large excavation machine for a long time outside.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Gift for husband
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband who likes to try different craft beers on draft. He loves it and gets several compliments and comments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Nora in Knoxville

customer_reviews.title: Its Stanley!!!
customer_reviews.text: It holds a whole pot of coffee!!!!! It is awesome for early morning/late night fishing trips.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

product_meta.title: Stanley Classic Easy-Pour Vacuum Insulated Growler
product_meta.description: . Stainless steel. 6.48" x 4.92" x 11.57". Leak proof. Dishwasher safe. 64oz capacity
feature_bullets: LEAK-PROOD LID: Stanley growler feature a leak proof lid with removable silicone gasket to ensure that you enjoy every last drop of your drink, the inner of lid it stainless steel so the only taste you get is that of your drink.

FRESH, COLD & CARBONATED: To keep your beer tasty, fizzy and cold for up to 24 hours, this Growler has BPA-Free double-wall vacuum insulation and a hinged lid. It doubles as an excellent thermos to store coffee, tea or soup and keeps hot up to 18 hours.

LARGE CAPACITY: This growler can store up to 64oz / 4 Pints / 2 Qt / 1.9L of your favorite beverage, making this ideal for any picnic, hike, or camping trip. You'll become the most popular person at any tailgating event.

FUNCTIONAL DESIGN: The built-in heavy duty handle makes it easy to carry and smooth to pour with one hand. The wide mouth allows for quick filling, sharing, and cleaning. It’s also dishwasher-safe for an easy clean.

LIFETIME WARRANTY: ‘BUILT FOR LIFE’. Since 1913 we’ve promised to provide rugged, capable gear for food and drink, built to last a lifetime. It’s a promise we still keep. Stanley products purchased from Stanley Resellers come with a lifetime warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
